doc.title: Snipets
doc.plot: "Snipets" were a unique series of one-minute instructional shorts designed for use within general entertainment programs for children. Each sixty-second segment emphasized a positive human value such as love, trust, respect and team play, or demonstrated imaginative creativity with unimaginable materials such as weeds, toothpicks, and dried beans. Enhanced by many different production techniques, these short vignettes packed maximum teaching into one-minute while at the same time, providing attention-holding entertainment.
